summary: Replaces the Dragon roars with more powerful one\'s.
descriptionHtml:
Hey there!
I had the idea for this mod because i was tired of getting attacked by dragons and always hear the same similar sounding roars. 
Another point is that Dragons roars should sound darker and more powerful like in Vanilla.
Its my first mod so im open for any fixes or ideas to make this better 
I would be glad if you enjoy this mod

A few sounds showed here
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mLdqjAl0gQI
or   http://youtu.be/mLdqjAl0gQI
author: CenturioLXXXIV
